name: ISB Ventures
overview: ISB Ventures is a private investment/consulting company. Through its principle investment lead, Dr. Israel Beinglass, ISB engages in consulting activities relating to the semiconductor and semiconductor CapEx industry, as well as investing in early stage companies. Dr. Israel Beinglass (managing director and founder of ISB Ventures) is a former executive at Applied Materials serves on the board and on the advisory board of several startups companies

funding_round.source_description: Noise Free raises $1.4M for VoIP sound quality improvement
